title: Circadian gene expression patterns on the periphery depend on the genotype

author: Rok Košir, Centre for Functional Genomics and Bio-Chips (CFGBC), Institute of Biochemistry, Faculty of Medicine, University of Ljubljana

Of course influence things such as endogenous and drug metabolism and liver as well as steroid metabolism in the adrenal glands.

Now a lot of the know how has come from using of course mouse models in circadian rhythms and you all know that mice are our best friends when it comes to molecular biological experiments, and during the years we have developed hundreds if not thousands of different mouse strains and this mouse strains of course differ in the genetic background and from human studies.

Expression analysis using quantitative PCR.
